ygData.subject: Bring The Warrior To The CR Room.

* Iron Raptor looked at Prowl, still with concern.
Her fingers caressed along his cheek as she met his loving gaze, her lips 
turning into a warm smile.
It was almost hard to believe that onmy 20 cycles ago Prowl had been laying 
in her arms, dying. And now here he was, low on energy but just as alive as 
ever before.
Iron Raptors' fingers stroke along his jawline and train down his neck as 
she listens to Prowls statement.
She nodds slightiny.*

" I think so too, love."

*Carefully she rose to a crouch as Prowl went limp in her arms, wondering 
just what the benifits to being a TM 2 was if you always ended up so low on 
energy.
Though, she made a mental note to ask Prowl that after he was fully 
repaired.
Iron Raptor picked Prowl's torso up, finally realizing just how heavy he 
was.
And HE was calling HER a truck?!
She almost chuckled at the thought but getting Prowl into a CR chamber was 
far more important then humor at the moment.
Iron Raptor waited as the doors to a CR chamber opened, then quickly draging 
Prowl into one.
This was the only way she knew that a bot could relax and energize at the 
same time, which was just what Prowl needed.
She proped him up against the back of the chamber and then squated down in 
front of him.*

" You'll be as good as new in a mega-cycle, love. Just relax and let the 
chamber do its thing. I'll see you in a bit."

* With that she jently kissed him on the forehead and walked out of the CR 
chamber, looking over her shoulder as the door closed behind her.
He would be alright now, just needed a bit of time to repair properly.
It was just then that her internal computer alerted her of something, 
locating and scanning the ship to find just what it was.
Hmmm.
Her scanners varified just what it was...Dinobot was back.
But also, her scanners alerted her that Feline wasn't in the ship as well.
Iron Raptor sighed and looked over to the repair station the cat had set up 
for Dinobot's return...looked like it was up to her now.
Though, she wouldn't do it alone, she had also scanned Tavatron alongside 
Dinobot...as well as a smaller bot.
Iron Raptor opened her com-link to Tavatron, time to get down to buisness.*

" Tavatron, this is Iron Raptor. I'm glad to see you guys made it back in 
time. I've already scanned Dinobot's damage and I would like you to bring 
him to the CF CR room, and we'll get down to work. Simply follow the arows 
on the walls. Iron out..."
